Description: Painted wooden figure of a woman playing a small angular harp.
Curator's comments: Published: PM viii, p. 714. Hickmann, Bulletin de l'histoire d'Egypte, XXXV (1952-3), p.333, fig.26. Leibovitch, JEA 46 (1960), p.53-9, pl.xiv. Manniche, Ancient Egyptian Musical Instruments, (1975), p.65. Anderson, Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities III, Musical Instruments, (1976) p.3, fig. 3. Anderson, JEA 63 (1977), p.189. Hart, Eyewitness Guides: Ancient Egypt, (1990), p.51. Bulté, Talismans égyptiens d'heureuse maternité, (1991), Doc. a 48= p.76 (+ bibl), p.106? Manniche, Music and Musicians, (1991), pl.18. J.H. Taylor & D. Antoine, Ancient lives, new discoveries, London 2014, p. 127.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2005-2006 22 Feb-29 May, London, The Jewish Museum, Passover 2014-15 22 May to 19 April, London, British Museum, 'Ancient Lives, New Discoveries'
